doc:
Emmett Dalton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emmett_Dalton 0 Emmett Dalton (May 3, 1871 – July 13, 1937) was an American outlaw, train robber and member of the Dalton Gang in the American Old West. Part of the ill-fated Dalton raid on two banks in Coffeyville, Kansas, he survived despite receiving 23 gunshot wounds. After serving 14 years in prison for the crime, Dalton capitalized on his notoriety to author books and become an actor in Hollywood. Emmett_Dalton ( May_3_,_1871 – July_13_,_1937 ) was an_American_outlaw , train_robber_and_member of the_Dalton_Gang in the_American_Old_West . Part of the_ill-fated_Dalton_raid on two_banks in Coffeyville , Kansas , he survived despite receiving 23_gunshot_wounds . After serving 14_years in prison for the_crime , Dalton capitalized on his_notoriety to author_books and become an_actor in Hollywood .
